articles.description: Elgar's team have now increased their chances of being invited back to Lord's for the WTC final but they are in danger of being the best in a business they are being systematically shut out of
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Coach thought I won't wake up after having 10 pegs but I scored hundred': Ex-India star ready to quit alcohol for job - Hindustan Times
